parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Button 1 and 3 pair mode
parameter.description: In separate mode button 1 works with group 1, button 3 with groups 3. Click is On, Hold is dimming Up, Double click is Off, Click-Hold is dimming Down. In pair button 1/3 are Up/Down correspondingly. Click is On/Off, Hold is dimming Up/Down. Single clicks works with group 1, double click with group 3.

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Button 2 and 4 pair mode
parameter.description: In separate mode button 1 works with group 2, button 4 with groups 3. Click is On, Hold is dimming Up, Double click is Off, Click-Hold is dimming Down. In pair button 2/4 are Up/Down correspondingly. Click is On/Off, Hold is dimming Up/Down. Single clicks works with group 2, double click with group 4.

parameter.name: config_11_1
parameter.label: 11: Action on group 1
parameter.description: In Switch On/Off only mode On command is sent on Dim Up, Off on Dim Down. In Scenes mode the scene ID sent is (10 * group + ActionID), where ActionID is: 1 = On, 2 = Off, 3 = Dim Up Start, 4 = Dim Down Start, 5 = Dim Up Stop, 6 = Dim Down Stop

options.option: Switch On/Off and Dim (send Basic Set and Switch Multilevel)
